snippet: Motorcycle maker Harley Davidson was among the biggest gainers after it announced a big stock buyback plan.
abstract: Stocks registered sharpest gains in week, pushing Nasdaq to new nominal high, after Federal Reserve signals that it will not raise interest rates in near future.
lead_paragraph: Motorcycle maker Harley Davidson was among the biggest gainers after it announced a big stock buyback plan.

headline.main: Market Gains for Third Straight Day, Pushing Nasdaq to New High
headline.print_headline: Relieved by Fed’s Signals, Markets Rise
